name: Jira Dark theme
description: Works with the latest version of JIRA 7 Any issues or improvements, raise them on GitHub
additional_info:
24-07-18 - Updated missing styles including pagination on issues page.
16-08-17 - Popup text visibility improvements, Sprint column headers visibility improvements.
28-07-17 - Improvements for flagged columns and tickets, ticket descriptions and text in a dropdown.
20-06-17 - Fix issues with gadgets and headers.
19-04-16 - Update to use SCSS, put the source code on GitHub and support for JIRA 7.
14-10-15 - Project release and reports pages styled.
21-09-15 - Updated Many pop-up boxes to follow the dark style.
13-08-15 - Darkens dropdown menu's.
12-08-15 - Now works with Agile boards.

discussions.name: It doesn't support one of the most popular Structure plugin
